title: 自从论坛升3.0后，，错误不断，，编辑个贴都这么难
author: ygujyh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ygujyh 于 2014-3-21 17:38 编辑 

Discuz! Database Error(1064) You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'Ships' ,mod_origion='2' ,mod_compatibility='25\x0924\x0922' ,mod_loader='6' ,mod' at line 1UPDATE forum_optionvalue1 SET mod_name_cn='阿基米德的船' ,mod_name_en='Archimedes' Ships' ,mod_origion='2' ,mod_compatibility='25 24 22' ,mod_loader='6' ,mod_language='6' ,mod_multiplayer='4' ,mod_install='2' WHERE tid=147605 AND fid=45

PHP Debug
No.FileLineCode1forum.php71require(%s)2source/module/forum/forum_post.php346require_once(%s)3source/include/post/post_editpost.php438discuz_container->editpost(Array)4source/include/post/post_editpost.php438discuz_container->__call(%s, Array)5source/class/discuz/discuz_container.php55discuz_container->_call(%s, Array, %d)6source/class/discuz/discuz_container.php84extend_thread_sort->before_editpost(Array)7source/class/extend/extend_thread_sort.php132discuz_container->update(%d, %s, %s, %s)8source/class/extend/extend_thread_sort.php132discuz_container->__call(%s, Array)9source/class/discuz/discuz_container.php62table_forum_optionvalue->update(%d, %s, %s, %s)10source/class/table/table_forum_optionvalue.php126discuz_database::query(%s, Array)11source/class/discuz/discuz_database.php136db_driver_mysql->query(%s, false, false)12source/class/db/db_driver_mysql.php151db_driver_mysql->halt(%s, %d, %s)13source/class/db/db_driver_mysql.php218break()
www.mcbbs.net 已经将此出错信息详细记录, 由此给您带来的访问不便我们深感歉意. Need Help?
